alert.note: Alert for East Sweetwater County; Green Mountains and Rattlesnake Range (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Watch issued February 12 at 12:43PM MST until February 15 at 12:00PM MST by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WATCH IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY EVENING THROUGH WEDNESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Northeast winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 60 mph possible. * WHERE...Green Mountains and Rattlesnake Range, mostly near Atlantic City and South Pass City southward and East Sweetwater County. * WHEN...From Tuesday evening through Wednesday morning. * IMPACTS...Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snowfall amounts look to be minimal across Sweetwater County, but blowing snow will be an additional hazard impacting travel conditions.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates on this situation. Fasten loose objects or shelter objects in a safe location prior to the onset of winds.

area.areaDesc: East Sweetwater County; Green Mountains and Rattlesnake Range
